question:
Consider the following powers of President of India:
  1. The power of the president to pardon a death sentence
  2. Promulgation of an ordinance by the president
  3. His decision on questions related to disqualification of Members of Parliament
Which of the above is/are subjected to judicial review?
explanation: The decision made by president on questions related to disqualification of members of parliament is not subjected to judicial review. The other two are subjected to judicial review
